name: Ozone Metaverse
description: What is the project about? Ozone provides the all-in-one solution for enterprises, digital media companies, brands, and governments to implement their metaverse strategies efficiently and effectively. The platform provides interoperability, scalability, and monetization solutions out of the box across web2 and web3. What makes your project unique? An interoperable 3D multi-chain platform with full monetization and instant deployment on the web History of your project: Built since 2019, our proprietary platform includes our 3D engine, web3 multichain solutions and Ai services.
